comment: I just made a N. German Alt and I'm afraid that the roast character might come through, against its style.  Your beer recipe has a roast malt of 2.4%.  Mine totaled 2.6%.  Did you get any roast out of your recipe?

I'm not certain of your meaning but my notes were that this had a darker color than I expected and a chocolate note to the taste. It was shading more to a brown ale than the lighter German ale I expected, but that the stronger grain flavor works with meats and stronger foods.
